author: Football Italia staff
title: COVID-19 immunity tests for players
description: When players do return to training, they will be rigorously tested and divided into three groups: positive, immune and not immune for COVID-19.  	The number of new cases, deaths and above all intensive care admissions are all dropping, suggesting Italy is pas…
content:
When players do return to training, they will be rigorously tested and divided into three groups: positive, immune and not immune for COVID-19.
